meanings.definition: A device used to measure direct solar radiation.
meanings.sent1: Scientists used pyrheliometers to study the sun's rays.
meanings.sent2: The pyrheliometers on the rooftop helped track sunlight exposure.
meanings.sent3: The pyrheliometers had a race to see which one could catch the most sunlight!
meanings.sent4: The pyrheliometers were like tiny detectives, uncovering the secrets of the sun.
meanings.sent5: With their shiny lenses, pyrheliometers were like little sun spies.

meanings.definition: Instruments used to measure the intensity of sunlight.
meanings.sent1: The pyrheliometers displayed the strength of the sunlight accurately.
meanings.sent2: Hikers carried pyrheliometers to gauge the brightness of the sun.
meanings.sent3: The pyrheliometers had a party to celebrate the sunny weather!
meanings.sent4: The pyrheliometers whispered the sun's power to the researchers.
meanings.sent5: Pyrheliometers were like light meters, revealing the sun's brilliance.
